#!/bin/bash
# format:
# multiple versions can be specified in DIST_VERSION,
# separated by $SEPARATOR.
#
# '##' followed by a variable name in the JOB_EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION
# or BUILD_DIR variables will be substituted by that variable
# at generation time.
#

# for parsing variables below
SEPARATOR=,

# job config file variables
#ASSIGNED_NODE=!master
BLOCKING_JOBS=administrative/block_all_jobs

DIST=lineage
DIST_LONG=LineageOS
DIST_VERSION=16.0
JOB_DIR=${DIST_LONG}_Builds/Samsung_Galaxy_J7
JOB_EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION="${DIST_LONG} ##DIST_VERSION for the ##DEVICE_MODEL"
JOB_PREFIX=los
BUILD_DIR=lineage-##{DIST_VERSION}
BUILD_TYPE=eng
BUILD_TARGET=otapackage

# format: DEVICE_CODENAME:DEVICE_MODEL:DESCRIPTION
# Use '_' to denote a space.
DEVICES=j7ltespr:SM-J700P,
DEVICES+=j7ltechn:SM-J7008

# extra commands to pass to build script
#SHELL_COMMANDS_EXTRA="--clean"
LOCAL_TOPICS="sepolicy-p,blobs-p,8916-audio-p"
LINEAGE_CHANGES="230240,223442,225974,227453,227454,223067,222733,222760,222742,225475,225476,229423,229424,228566,228569,228570,228572,228573,228574,228575,228576,228578,228580,228582,228583,228584,228585,228586,228587,227260,227261,223008,229489,223413,224446,224513,226587,226588,226600,229255,229256,225682,225683,225684,225721,225722,225726,225727,225728,227820,229254,225693,225606,225702,226249,225729,225734,226236,225859,226276,224844,225754,225582,227108,226615,227821,228405,229230,224443,225545,225546,226647,226648,226649,226650,226651,226652,226653,226654,226656,226658,226683,226684,226685,226686,226687,226688,226689,226690,226691,226692,226693,226694,226695,226696,226697,226698,226699,226700,226701,226702,226703,226704,226705,226706,226707,226708,226709,226710,226711,226712,226713,226714,226715,226716,226717,226718,226719,226720,226721,226722,226723,226724,226725,226726,226727,226728,226729,226730,226731,226732,226733,226734,226735,226736,226737,226738,226739,226740,226741,226742,226743,223685,226744,226745,223678,223683,223684,226862,223686,223687,223692,223688,224246,224386,225543,226075,226076,226077,228524,225628,225629,225630,225631,225632,225633,225634,225635,226080,230047,225581,224752,225255,225256,225257,225258,225259,225260,225261,225262,225263,225264,225265,225281,225284,226131,225280,225388,225397,225401,229305,226145,226863,226392,225730,226142,226148,226150,226151,225570,225755,225756,226154,225858,227120,228403,228404,229384,224264,223085,229304,224198,225921"
LINEAGE_TOPICS="8916-display-p,pie-dataservices"

# extra commands to pass to build script
SHELL_COMMANDS_EXTRA=" --pick-topic $LOCAL_TOPICS  --pick-lineage $LINEAGE_CHANGES --pick-lineage-topic $LINEAGE_TOPICS"
